search.query: | eventcount summarize=false index=* | dedup index | fields index
|metadata type=sourcetypes index=* | table sourcetype
$index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ | dedup orig | table orig

panel.title: Top 5 Malware By Number of Hosts

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top Protection_Name by dest_ip |fields - count percent|stats count(dest_ip) as Hosts by Protection_Name |sort 5 - Hosts|rename Protection_Name as "Top Malware"

panel.title: Malware Incidents Trend

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"| timechart count(eval(malware_action)) AS "Total" ,count(eval(severity>2)) AS "Critical & High severity incidents"

panel.title: High and critical incidents

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"|top 5 malware_action |fields - percent

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : DNS query for a site known to contain malware :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="DNS query for a site known to contain malware"| eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip |eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : Access to site known to contain malware :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Access to site known to contain malware" | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip|top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : Malicious file/exploit download :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious file/exploit download"| eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip| eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : Communication with C&C site :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Communication with C&C site"| eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : DNS query for a C&C site :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="DNS query for a C&C site"| eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip| eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name) |top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Host With High or Critical Severity Incidents : Malicious DNS request :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious DNS request"| eventstats sum(received_bytes) as Sent_Bytes by dest_ip| eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top Protection_Name by dest_ip severity Sent_Bytes|sort - severity Sent_Bytes count | fields - percent |rename count as "Number of Incidents"|rename dest_ip as Host

panel.title: Top Hosts Involved in Malicious Activity: By Number of incidents :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious network activity" | top limit=10 dest_ip |fields - percent|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Hosts Involved in Malicious Activity:By Sent Traffic (Bytes) :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious network activity" |stats count(received_bytes) as Sent_Traffic by dest_ip |sort 10 - Sent_Traffic|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Hosts Involved in Malicious Activity : By number of incidents :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"malware_action="Malicious network activity" | stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Hosts Involved in Malicious Activity :By Sent Traffic (Bytes) :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"malware_action="Malicious network activity" | stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes ,count(received_bytes) AS "Sent_Bytes" BY dest_ip|sort - Sent_Bytes|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Malware: By Number of Incidents :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"|eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)| top Protection_Name | fields - percent|rename count as "Number of Incidents"

panel.title: Top Malware by sent traffic :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" |eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)|top received_bytes by Protection_Name |sort 10 - received_bytes | fields - count percent| rename received_bytes as "Sent Traffic in Bytes"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts :Access to site known to contain malware :

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Access to site known to contain malware"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts :DNS query for a C&C site

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="DNS query for a C&C site"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts:Communication with C&C site

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Communication with C&C site"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts:DNS query for a site known to contain malware

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"malware_action="DNS query for a site known to contain malware"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts :Malicious Network Activity

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"malware_action="Malicious network activity"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts :Malicious DNS request

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious DNS request"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts:Malicious file/exploit download

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action="Malicious file/exploit download"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts:Spam

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" malware_action=Spam |stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents",count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes ,values(eval(from)) AS "To", values(eval(to)) AS "From" BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts:DNS client query or DNS server resolving a C&C site

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"malware_action="DNS client query or DNS server resolving a C&C site"| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY dest_ip|sort - Incidents|rename dest_ip as "Host"

panel.title: Top Activities and their Top Hosts

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" |top malware_action

panel.title: Top Protection Types and their Top Malware :DNS Reputation

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus"Protection_Type="DNS reputation" | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY Protection_Name |sort - Incidents

panel.title: Top Protection Types and their Top Malware: DNS Trap

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" Protection_Type="DNS Trap" | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY Protection_Name |sort - Incidents

panel.title: Top Protection Types and their Top Malware:Protection

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" Protection_Type=protection | eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY Protection_Name |sort - Incidents

panel.title: Top Protection Types and their Top Malware:URL Reputation

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" Protection_Type="URL reputation"| eval Protection_Name = if(isnotnull(Protection_name),Protection_name,Protection_Name)| stats count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents" ,count(eval(te_action="monitor")) AS Detected, count(eval(te_action="prevent")) AS Prevent ,count(sent_bytes) AS Received_bytes BY Protection_Name |sort - Incidents

panel.title: Top Protection Types and their Top Malware

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" |top Protection_Type

panel.title: Malware Activity

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" | timechart span=1d count(eval(te_action)) AS "Incidents",distinct_count(dest_ip) as Host ,count(eval(sent_bytes)) AS "Received Traffic",count(eval(received_bytes)) AS "Sent Traffic"

panel.title: Malware Activity By number of hosts and Number of Incidents

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" |timechart count(eval(dest_ip)) AS "Number of Hosts" ,count(eval(te_action)) AS "Number of Incidents"

panel.title: Malware Activity : Sent and Received Traffic

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" | timechart count(eval(dest_ip)) AS "Number of Hosts" ,count(eval(te_action)) AS "Number of Incidents"

panel.title: Top Destination Countries

search.query: $index_tok$ $sourcetype_tok$ $orig$ product="Anti Malware" OR product="New Anti Virus" | iplocation src_ip | geostats count by City
